translation.settings.title: Settings
translation.onboarding.welcome.title: Private Messaging
translation.onboarding.welcome.subtitle: Secure, decentralized, and anonymous.
translation.onboarding.welcome.features.encrypted.de: Your messages are only readable by you and your recipient.
translation.onboarding.welcome.features.decentralize: Built on Nostr, ensuring no single entity owns your data.
translation.onboarding.welcome.passphrase.label: Identity Passphrase
translation.onboarding.welcome.passphrase.help: This passphrase encrypts your identity locally. Don't lose it!
translation.onboarding.welcome.disclaimer: By continuing, you agree to our privacy-first terms.
translation.onboarding.creating.title: Creating Your Identity
translation.onboarding.creating.desc: Generating cryptographic keys for your secure profile...
translation.onboarding.username.title: Choose your username
translation.onboarding.username.subtitle: How should others find you on the network?
translation.onboarding.username.label: Username
translation.onboarding.username.help: At least 3 characters. Only lowercase letters, numbers, and underscores.
translation.onboarding.contact.title: Add Your First Contact
translation.onboarding.contact.desc: Have a friend's invite code? Enter it below to start your first private conversation.
translation.onboarding.complete.title: Setup Complete!
translation.onboarding.complete.securityDesc: Your keys are safely stored and encrypted on this device.
translation.messaging.gettingStartedDesc: Complete these steps to start your secure messaging journey.
translation.messaging.unlockIdentityDesc: Decrypt your private key to sign messages.
translation.messaging.connectRelaysDesc: Connect to the Nostr network to send/receive.
translation.messaging.startAChatDesc: Find a friend or join a group.
translation.messaging.identityLockedDesc: Your session is locked to protect your privacy.
translation.messaging.selectConversationDesc: Choose a chat from the sidebar or start a new one to begin messaging.
translation.messaging.shareDesc: Share your public key with others to let them message you.
translation.messaging.pubkeySafeShare: Public keys are safe to share!
translation.messaging.error.nip05.fetch_failed: Failed to connect to the domain's server.
translation.messaging.error.nip05.not_found: Identifier not found on this domain.
translation.messaging.strangerWarningDesc: You haven't accepted this person yet. Exercise caution before opening attachments or clicking links.
translation.messaging.noPendingRequestsDesc: New conversations from people you haven't accepted yet will appear here.
translation.messaging.pendingRequestsHelp: Requests are messages from users you haven't approved yet. They cannot see your online status until you accept.
translation.messaging.connectionPending: Connection request pending. Accept to start messaging.
translation.messaging.recipientNotFound: Recipient profile not found on your relays. Delivery might be unreliable.
translation.messaging.shareInviteLinkDesc: Share your invite link so they can find you.
translation.messaging.userNotFoundDesc: We couldn't find this user on the connected relays. They might be new or not broadcasting yet.
translation.messaging.chatStart: This is the start of your encrypted conversation.
translation.messaging.connectionRequestsNote: Messages will be sent as connection requests until accepted.
translation.messaging.dropToUploadDesc: Images or videos will be attached to your message
translation.messaging.noMedia: No media found in this conversation
translation.identity.title: Your Identity
translation.identity.description: This is your cryptographic identity on the Nostr network.
translation.settings.tabs.privacyTrustDesc: Manage who you trust and who can reach you directly.
translation.settings.tabs.storageDesc: Configure where your file attachments are uploaded.
translation.settings.profilePublishFailed: Failed to publish. Check relay connections.
translation.settings.deleteAccountDesc: This will permanently remove your account key from this device and reset all local data. This action cannot be undone.
translation.settings.deleteAccountConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete your account and reset all data? This cannot be undone.
translation.settings.health.title: System Health
translation.settings.health.desc: Monitor the status of your connection and identity.
translation.settings.updates.title: Updates
translation.settings.updates.desc: Keep your application up to date.
translation.settings.updates.help: Updates are checked automatically on startup. You can also manually trigger a check here.
translation.settings.notifications.unsupported: Your browser does not support desktop notifications.
translation.settings.notifications.blocked: Notifications are blocked by your browser settings. Please enable them to receive alerts.
translation.settings.notifications.backgroundDesc: Enable background notifications to stay updated when the app is closed.
translation.settings.notifications.title: Notifications
translation.settings.notifications.desc: Manage how you want to be notified.
translation.settings.dmPrivacy.desc: Control who can send you direct messages.
translation.settings.dmPrivacy.filterNote: Stranger messages will be filtered out.
translation.settings.storage.externalDesc: Upload files directly to a Nostr storage provider.
translation.settings.storage.apiUrlDesc: The endpoint where files will be POSTed. Requires NIP-98 support for auth.
translation.settings.storage.localModeDesc: Local uploads are strictly for the Desktop app or private local relays. On Vercel, you must select an External Provider above.
translation.settings.storage.guidanceWhy: Web browsers cannot save files to servers directly without a dedicated storage layer like NIP-96.
translation.settings.storage.guidancePrivacy: Providers like void.cat prioritize no-logging policies and encryption headers.
translation.settings.storage.guidanceCapacity: nostr.build provides the most stable multi-device experience.
translation.settings.relays.title: Relay Connections
translation.settings.relays.desc: Manage your connections to Nostr relays.
translation.settings.relays.supportOnlyWss: Only secure wss:// URLs are supported.
translation.settings.relays.noRelaysDesc: Add a relay to start communicating.
translation.settings.relays.unlockToManage: Unlock your identity to manage relays.
translation.settings.relays.resetHelp: Use this if you are having trouble connecting or finding users.
translation.settings.relays.metadataWarning: Relay membership is public and shared with other users.
translation.settings.blocklist.title: Blocked Users
translation.settings.blocklist.desc: Managing blocked users. You won't receive messages from anyone on this list.
translation.settings.blocklist.unlockToManage: Unlock your identity to view blocked users.
translation.profile.title: Profile
translation.profile.description: Manage your public presence on the network.
translation.profile.usernameHelp: This is your display name visible to others.
translation.profile.avatarHelp: Link to your public profile picture.
translation.profile.nip05Help: Connect your identity to a domain.
translation.profile.localPreferenceHelp: This is a local preference right now (not published to relays).
translation.profile.inviteSystemProfileDesc: Manage your profile information and privacy settings for the invite system.
translation.profile.ghostAccountDesc: If others can't find you, click **Save & Publish** to broadcast your profile to all connected relays.
translation.appearance.title: Appearance
translation.appearance.desc: Customize how the application looks and feels.
translation.settings.appearance.title: Appearance
translation.settings.appearance.desc: Customize how the application looks and feels.
translation.settings.selectLanguageDesc: Choose your preferred language for the interface.
translation.settings.appearance.themeDesc: Switch between light and dark modes.
translation.settings.security.title: Privacy & Safety
translation.settings.security.encryption.title: At-Rest Encryption
translation.settings.security.encryption.desc: Encrypt message database with your private key on your device.
translation.settings.security.autoLock.title: Auto-Lock Identity
translation.settings.security.autoLock.desc: Secure your session when you step away from your device.
translation.settings.security.clipboard.title: Clipboard Safety
translation.settings.security.clipboard.desc: Wipe clipboard contents when identity is locked.
translation.settings.security.tor.title: Tor Network (Onion)
translation.settings.security.tor.desc: Route all relay traffic through the Tor network. Required for maximum anonymity.
translation.settings.security.tor.restartRequired: Restart required to apply proxy settings.
translation.settings.security.zeroKnowledge.title: Zero Knowledge Policy
translation.settings.security.zeroKnowledge.desc: Obscur never shares your private keys or unencrypted messages. Security configurations are stored locally and never synced with any remote server.
translation.settings.security.noBlockedFound: No blocked users matching your search.
translation.settings.security.acceptedDesc: **Accepted** peers can see your presence and bypass the request inbox.
translation.settings.security.mutedDesc: **Muted** peers can still message you, but you won't receive notifications.
translation.settings.security.blockedDesc: **Blocked** peers are completely invisible and cannot reach you.
translation.download.title: Download Obscur
translation.download.subtitle:
Secure, local-first messaging for your micro-community.
Available on desktop and web, with mobile coming soon.
translation.download.mobileAppDesc:
Native iOS and Android apps are in development.
In the meantime, you can use the web app on your mobile browser.
translation.search.noUsersFound: No users found. Try an exact match or npub.
translation.search.exactKeyDesc: Paste an exact key or type a name.
translation.invites.title: Connections
translation.invites.sharePrompt: Share this link with a friend. It includes your public key and relay hints.
translation.invites.shareText: Chat with me on Obscur using my invite link:
translation.invites.noIdentityDesc: Create an identity to use the invite system.
translation.invites.importContactsDesc: Import contacts from a JSON file
translation.invites.importSourceDesc: Import contacts from a Nostr contact list (NIP-02 format) or an Obscur export file.
translation.invites.importLargeListNote: This may take a moment for large contact lists
translation.invites.exportContactsDesc: Export your contacts to a JSON file
translation.invites.exportSourceDesc: Export all your contacts (except blocked ones) to a JSON file that can be imported later.
translation.invites.exportFormatDesc: Contacts are exported in NIP-02 compatible format.
translation.invites.howToPrepare: How to prepare your contact list
translation.invites.fileFormatDesc: Your JSON file should contain a contacts array with public keys.
translation.invites.validationKeys: Public keys must be valid Nostr public keys
translation.invites.validationLarge: Large imports may take several minutes
translation.invites.rateLimitingDesc: Imports are rate-limited to prevent system overload.
translation.invites.noContactsDesc: Try changing your filters or add a new contact.
translation.shortcuts.title: Keyboard Shortcuts
translation.shortcuts.toggleHelp: Press Shift+? to toggle this help
translation.shortcuts.toggleHelpEsc: Press Esc to close this help
